section.heading: Copy of application; inventory and license to be posted; license to be referred to in advertisements

content.p:
ยง 589. Copy of application; inventory and license to be posted;
license to be referred to in advertisements. A copy of the application
for a license to conduct a sale under this article, including the
inventory filed therewith, shall be posted in a conspicuous place in the
sales room or place where the inventoried goods, wares or merchandise
are to be sold, so that the public may be informed of the facts relating
to such goods, wares and merchandise before purchasing them. Any
advertisement or announcement published in connection with the sale
shall conspicuously show on its face the number of the license, the date
of its expiration, and if applicable, the location where the business is
to be resumed.
